brand.mission: To provide affordable, high-quality education and mentorship for the IIT Madras BS Degree program. We bridge the gap between complex academic requirements and student success through simplified notes, live guidance, and a supportive community—at a fraction of the standard cost.
brand.disclaimer: GenZ IITian is a personal initiative and is not officially affiliated with, associated with, or endorsed by IIT Madras. All content is created for educational purposes to support students.

He is known for his energy, relatability, and ability to simplify complex math and coding concepts.

about: I am a developer and researcher passionate about bridging the gap between complex data and intuitive user experiences. Currently pursuing a BS in Data Science and Applications at IIT Madras, I focus on building intelligent systems that blend robust engineering with modern design principles.

My work sits at the intersection of creativity and logic—whether it's crafting immersive 3D web environments, developing real-time analytical dashboards, or architecting scalable web applications. I am driven by curiosity and a commitment to open-source innovation.
